title: Coronavirus: UK government targets gamers with 'Stay at Home' message
description: Games companies have teamed up with the government to insert coronavirus advice into their products
content:
Video game players across the UK will be targeted with adverts reminding them to stay indoors during the coronavirus pandemic.
